metaTitle: efurbished Dell Latitude 5490 – Ultimate Budget-Friendly Business Laptop
metaDescription: Refurbished Dell Latitude 5490 is a powerful yet budget-friendly business laptop with Intel Core i5 8th Gen, SSD storage, 14-inch display, and enterprise-grade durability.
